actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 5314 of title 49, United States Code, to assist compliance with the transit provisions of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990.

summary.text: Accessible Transportation Act of 1997 - Amends Federal transportation law to reauthorize and increase appropriations from the Mass Transit Account of the Highway Trust Fund for FY 1998 through 2002 to help mass transportation providers comply with the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5314 of title 49, United States Code, to assist compliance with the transit provisions of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990.
